website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality control issues, this stylish sofa is worth the effort it will take to assemble it.
pros: Made of soft Chenille fabric and available in neutral colors
Armless chair section has a hidden storage compartment
Size works well for mid-sized rooms
cons: Some sofas arrived damaged or with missing hardware

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase-True to photo
customer_reviews.text: Couch is basically exactly what you see in the picture. The size is good and for the price I cannot complain at all. I would note that the cushions are firm. They are not uncomfortable, but if you do not like firm cushions then this couch is not for you. I am very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: hard to assemble, worth while when assembled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sectional last week, on time fast delivery (3 days only)... 2 boxes, well packaged. the reason why I give 4 stars is it was hard to assemble.. After the assembly, the couch looks good, and the fabric seems to be durable (however it's too soon to tell).. will update this post in a couple of months if anything changes. overall I love my new couch :)
customer_reviews.author: alireza

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. My guys put together while I was out at the store. Didn’t seem like it took long. They said there is nothing that hooks the chaise part, so it slides. Nothing I’m complaining about, just push it back over. It is very hard and the back cusions are short. We needed something affordable for our first home with our new massive expenses, so this works for us. The chaise is long enough for my 6’3” husband. And that end to lounge or sit in the corner isn’t that uncomfortable! I added pillows for back support. Our space is big and this fit perfect! Came with throw pillows I will use elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in a week in 2 big boxes and went together like Legos. Stiff cushions but should eventually soften up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice sectional
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sectional at a great price. It's a bit firmer than what I like but it's perfect for my hubs and I'm hoping with some wear maybe it'll get a little softer. The pillows (which are removable) are very comfortable and cushy but with them I do wish the seat were deeper so that I could really lean back into them and not feel like their trying to push me off the couch! The material feels like good quality and it looks fantastic. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Norell Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sofa for our living room as a family of five so the space is great. However I am very disappointed how cheaply made it is, my husband being a heavy man won’t even sit on it! It arrived in two boxes which I unpacked and built the sofa myself because it’s that light weight and the backs are not very sturdy. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hale

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!! AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is absolutely horrible! The arm rest came broken, it came with a cracked frame and ripped (stitching falling out) cushions. I am EXTREMELY disappointed. Will never reccomend this product to anyone, I HIGHLY discourage anyone from purchasing this and will absolutely take my business elsewhere in the future. This was a very bad purchase on my behalf and is so broken we can't even use it! I wish I knew better and went to Jordan's or Bob's etc as the quality is 1000x better than this. All around awful product, quality, material etc. Just TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get, What you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an apartment. Really light weight. I do not like the fact that the arm rest is too low and it causes the person to not feel comfortable. Also the backrest piece tends to get lose when you push back a little too hard, so it's best if you lean the sofa on a wall. It was easy to assemble. Can be a bit confusing. The sofas is not bad for someting temporary not long term.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan vargas

customer_reviews.title: Do not give in! Terrible in all aspects!
customer_reviews.text: None of the pieces fit together. Absolute nightmare to put together. Had to literally break the wood to fit some of them. On top of that, the couch came delivered with a massive hole punched in the base of the couch. Also not the color we ordered at all. The light gray was way darker than pictured. We bought a couch from Rooms to Go for cheaper and the quality is fantastic and it comes with a 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this couch for a year now and gets a ton of use. I wanted something at a cheap cost without completely sacrificing comfort/style. The cushions have worn down a bit and you can feel the springs if you are looking for it. It is still comfortable and the fabric is easily cleaned with a carpet cleaner. I would purchase this sectional again knowing it will not be my 'forever' couch. My brother actually just ordered one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lol it’s not easy to put it together
customer_reviews.text: 10 minute assembly my ass! Took 2 hours that’s the only reason I gave it that review other than that it’s a good starter couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have to move a lot
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble but cheap parts make it harder than it should be and I like that it is reversible and easy to pack for moves. Price is to high for what you get though. It's made out of incredibly cheap wood and what appears to be ratchet straps. BIG LOTS had a much nicer more comfortable sectionals for the same price and sometimes cheaper with sales.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Weber-Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Sits very firm!
customer_reviews.text: The couch is nice! It is a very firm couch. If you’re looking for a soft couch keep looking. The color is more of a grayish brown. Very nice pullout sofa with a nice, thick, queen sized memory foam mattress. Also included an air pump and a separate full sized air mattress! Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent couch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good couch for the price, however.. this couch was so difficult to put together even with the instruction manual, the more we use it, it seems like the cushions are sagging a bit. But, overall suits my purposes, for now
customer_reviews.author: TylerSage

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest waste of money I am responsible for in my 72 years on this earth. The sofa was to be used in my finished basement. As I put it together it was obvious to me this cheaply made piece of thin plywood covered with awful material , of course made in china, where all cheap stuff is made, was not what I wanted guests of mine to sit on. So, my option is to send it back, at my expense or take it to the dump. The dump it is. I will never purchase furniture from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Kasnia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this item and am weary of buying another price of furniture from Amazon. This couch already looks like I have had it for years, the screws in the back aren't holding the couch together. Now we have to be careful when we sit in it. It was a purchase that I thought would be intriguing but I regret it. We don't have children, so we are delicate with it. And for the price, we really shouldn't have these concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Roger-that

customer_reviews.title: Great Sofa for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s great! I also bought the ottoman. In the picture the ottoman appears to be a darker gray but it’s actually the same color as the sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: great value !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sectional I added some different pillows with a pop of burnt orange for the room Decor great value
customer_reviews.author: Jana Stone-blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not even 2years old and are throwing them away. They fall apart!!!! No kids and I have wife that doesn’t even let me wear shoes in the house and even on under her care they fell apart save your money pls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood is not strong
customer_reviews.text: The wood is not very strong. The pillows were not the same as in the photo. The ottoman is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this couch!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this couch! It came in two large boxes and was very easy to assemble. My boyfriend and I did it in less than 30 minutes. It a great size, but fits perfectly in my small space at the same time. It’s firm, but I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: twinmama

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Took about six weeks to get. Easy to assemble but the fabric is scratchy and cushions are hard. Packaging was very tore up once I did receive it. Nothing seemed to be damaged except one of the pegs for the backrest was bent. Not sure if from shipping or how it was made.
customer_reviews.author: Pheck

customer_reviews.title: NOT reversible
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is NOT reversible as stated in some of the reviews. So I’m very disappointed as I cannot configure it to my room. I have to give it 1 star because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little tricky but we had it figured out and assembled in less than an hour. Firm but comfy enough to lounge in. Overall looks like the picture and the price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Couch is rock solid and you can barely fit on it when you sit down. In order to lay down or sit you have to remove the cushions
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together and the comfortably is good and the pull out bed is perfect. I love you it totally worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Texture is kind of rough but easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sofá missing
customer_reviews.text: Missing the leg rest the small piece in the middle of the picture
customer_reviews.author: Jacinto Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I’ve ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly manufactured. Missing mounts for the feet. Eight feet required but only six mounts on the product. Very low quality fabric and stitching was irregular. Packaged in a way that seemed like it was just thrown in the box with cushions crushed and damaged. I returned everything.
customer_reviews.author: Yoki_

customer_reviews.title: All pieces not included
customer_reviews.text: picture is not accurate to what is included. Only includes 3 pieces. ottoman is not included which I already knew. Also one extension piece is not included. Wish I had know before I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Cybros

customer_reviews.title: How many pieces is the Coaster Home Furnishings Sectional Sofa, Grey/Black
customer_reviews.text: How many pieces is the Coaster Home Furnishings Living Room Sectional Sofa, Grey/Black I counted four please advise
customer_reviews.author: Christina

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings Living Room Sectional Sofa, Brown/Black
product_meta.description: This coaster Provence transitional Brown/Black sectional sofa with chaise and built-in storage measures 137" length x 88" Width x 36" Height. Great for cozy living rooms, this transitional sectional offers style and versatility to your space. The fabric is a comfy soft chenille in a multi-tone brown that's easy to maintain and looks great. Beneath the center armless chair is a spacious storage area, perfect for storing pillows and blankets for overnight guests. The large-scale design offers plenty of seating space for you and your guests, making this a perfect piece for your living room. A kiln-dried hardwood frame construction makes for a stable and sturdy support design. Three accent pillows are included to round out the piece.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 137" W x 88" D x 36" H | Seat Height: 19.5" | Seat Depth: 21.25" | Weight: 296.12 lbs
Great for cozy living rooms, this Transitional sectional offers style and versatility to your space
The fabric is a comfy soft Chenille in a multi-tone brown that's easy to maintain and looks great
Beneath the center Armless chair is a spacious storage area, perfect for storing pillows and blankets for overnight guests
The large-scale design offers Plenty of seating space for you and your guests, making this a perfect piece for your living room
A kiln-dried hardwood frame Construction makes for a stable and Sturdy support design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars68 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
